channel.title: Complete Lunar Package (Emotes, GFX, Interfaces, ect)
channel.description:
http://www.mediafire.com/?1kkjjkiyzc0
I was collecting this and doing everything hard coded, but then realized that was dumb, so i gave up.
If you don't know how to add these, then you don't deserve this.
You need to:
Gzip models, rename the model id under 15000 (unless preloading)
Add configs in ect....
http://www.mediafire.com/?1kkjjkiyzc0
______________________
Credits:
Harry GFX Dump SWAT Emote dump Ben for Lunar Interface Me for getting everything and putting it together

item.title: Complete Lunar Package (Emotes, GFX, Interfaces, ect)
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:7, topic:339555”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=435935.msg3204291#msg3204291 date=1273634436]
@Badger41, because 99.9% of the time its NOT theirs, and they have no idea what they are talking about. Especially Wolfs Goal, he said he had skill cape emotes like 2-3 months ago, and said he was going to show it off, but yet never seemed to. And when i asked him how to extend the frames a 317 can take, he had no idea.

@Faded Vision, Post proof, otherwise its just spam.
[/quote]

@You, I didn’t reply to your PM because I know you would have just leeched it. I’m not fucking stupid, and BTW, anyone can go on runescape and grab emotes, then go into RSMV and grab models for the Animations…

It isn’t impossible…Also, I do have skillcape emotes. Don’t hate cause you can’t get what you want. If you worked hard at creating stuff, which over half this community lacks, you would be able to say you did something cool. Would you release knowing that over 50% of a community of 100,000’s is just waiting so they can leech it and take credit? No, you wouldn’t but others would, why? I have no idea, I tried being nice at first but you wouldn’t accept it…Since you wont, fine, but next time don’t flame someone for posting back on something others already have…You posting this was like as if you reposted dragon claws models. so… [size=36pt]GTFO OR STOP FLAMING[/size][/quote]

I’m sure you do have skill cape emotes thats why you failed to show me and SilentCJ you had them?

LOL splitting them into 2 files? Are you retarded? No you have no idea whats so ever how to do it, me and CJ asked you simple questions, and you couldn’t answer.

Please I dare you to take 3-4 hours searching for models, animations, and GFX’s. I dare you.

Please learn some grammar before you speak again. Thanks

Read full topic

Well, no one else has posted so I guess I will.

I already have these, but thanks anyways. This will help those leachers.

@Off Topic: Woot First Post.
[/quote]

I doubt you had these, but thanks -.-[/quote]

i doubt you think anyone has anything, anytime anyone ever posts a project or something use ful its either:

“i doubt you have…” or “i doubt you made…”

stop hatin and learn to acknowledge that people actually have shit.

item.title: Complete Lunar Package (Emotes, GFX, Interfaces, ect)
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

MediaFire

Lunar Package by TheElveAge.rar

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

I was collecting this and doing everything hard coded, but then realized that was dumb, so i gave up.

If you don’t know how to add these, then you don’t deserve this.

You need to:

Gzip models, rename the model id under 15000 (unless preloading)

Add configs in ect…

MediaFire

Lunar Package by TheElveAge.rar

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

Credits:

Harry GFX Dump
SWAT Emote dump
Ben for Lunar Interface
Me for getting everything and putting it together
